text.__SUMMARY__: Nepenthes zygon is a tropical pitcher plant native to the Philippines. The type specimen originates from a plant cultivated at the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, grown from seed collected in 1997 by Robert Cantley on Mount Pasian, Mindanao.
text.References: Rowson, D. 2015. Caught in a trap. The Biologist 62(2): 12–14.
